description_carte: The Tidal Tempest. Commands the power of the ocean, summoning waves and tidal forces.
description_visuelle: A graceful humanoid figure with flowing blue hair and shimmering scales. She holds a trident and is surrounded by swirling water.

skills.name: Water Jet
skills.description: Fires a high-pressure jet of water.

skills.name: Tidal Wave
skills.description: Summons a wave of water that damages and slows enemies.

skills.name: Healing Rain
skills.description: Summons a rain of healing water to restore health.

skills.name: Aqua Shield
skills.description: Creates a water shield, boosting DEF and reflecting some damage.

skills.name: Ocean's Wrath
skills.description: Calls upon the ocean's power to unleash a devastating torrent of water, greatly increases atk. Chance to stun target.
